name: Unity Snake MVP
description:
Description:
This project contains different examples of how one could implement a minimal viable product for the well known Snake game in Unity. It is fully documented including in scene 'post-it' on GameObjects and source code comments. 

Key Controls: Space to start, cursors to control snake.
Mouse/mobile Controls: Click/tap to start, swipe to control snake.

Source code:
https://github.com/innerdrivestudios/snake_mvp
Provided to you for free, but support to develop more of these kind of projects is always appreciated ;).
